name: SEARCH ALL - MUSHROOMS
description:
SEARCH ALL - MUSHROOMS

is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the mushrooms in a large location. Mushrooms will be located in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places. The whole game location looks lively because of the animation elements. Find all the mushrooms! Don't let them go unnoticed :)

Key Features:
- Animation elements on location;
- 100 mushrooms to find;
- Pleasant soundtrack;
- The gameplay can be interrupted at any time, and the game will automatically save the result;
- Implemented hints! If you find it difficult to find an item, use the hint!
